scripts.patch-package: cd app && rm -f ../blitz-package-backup.json && cp package.json ../blitz-package-backup.json && patch -i ../package.diff
scripts.reset-and-build: yarn new-gen-patches && yarn reset-and-apply-patch && yarn dist
scripts.create-patched-src: rm -rf src/modified && rm -rf src/original && cp -R app/src src/original && cp -R app/src src/modified && node src/recursive-patch.js src/modified
scripts.generate-patches: cd src && diff -raN -U 6 original modified > ../patch.diff || true
scripts.reset-and-apply-patch: rm -rf app/src && cp -R src/original app/src && yarn new-apply-patch
scripts.clean: rm -rf app && rm -rf src/original && rm -rf src/modified && rm -rf build-resources && rm -rf dist
scripts.patch-and-run-electron: yarn new-gen-patches && yarn reset-and-apply-patch && yarn run-electron
scripts.patch-and-run-standalone: yarn new-gen-patches && yarn reset-and-apply-patch && yarn dist --linux dir && ./dist/linux-unpacked/blitz-desktop
scripts.setup: yarn clean && yarn extract && yarn create-patched-src && yarn new-apply-patch
